targets.expr: (sum(op_batcher_default_refs_number{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", layer="l1", type="latest"}) > 0) - (sum(op_batcher_default_refs_number{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", layer="l1_origin", type="loaded"}) > 0)

(sum(op_batcher_default_refs_number{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", layer="l1", type="latest"}) > 0) - (sum(op_batcher_default_refs_number{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", layer="l1_origin", type="added"}) > 0)

(sum(op_batcher_default_refs_number{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", layer="l2", type="loaded"}) > 0) - (sum(op_batcher_default_refs_number{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", layer="l2", type="added"}) > 0)

panels.title: Blob Used Bytes Histogram Over Time

panels.description: If blob base fee is > 16x base fee, consider switching from blobs to calldata (this will be automatic if the batcher is configured for auto DA selection). Note that the batcher's internal DA switching logic uses a more involved calculation than the dashboard so may not switch DA type precisely when the panel would indicate it should -- see batcher logs filtered for cost_ratio.
panels.title: Basefee & suggested tip cap [log(wei)]

panels.description: These events fire when, as a channel is about to be submitted, the batcher detects that it would be cheaper to send using a different DA layer (calldata or blobs). The blocks in the channel are requeued and a new channel is built on the fly.
panels.title: Requeuing events
Required TX gas bumps to inclusion
